en.question: What is the difference between room options?
en.answer: Room options vary depending on the size of bed (single 100cm width or semidouble 120cm width) and room size. For details please refer to the rooms section of the website.

en.question: Are there rooms for more than one person?
en.answer: Unfortunately no. All rooms are for one person.

en.question: Is breakfast provided?
en.answer: Yes breakfast is provided, at separate cost. Please inquire at the front desk if you would like breakfast.

en.question: Do the rooms come with a shower and bathroom?
en.answer: No. There are gender-segregated communal showers and bathrooms.

en.question: Does the room come with a lock?
en.answer: Unfortunately no. Due to regulations capsule hotels do not come with door locks. The pod comes with a safe for locking your valuables and you'll also get a private locker to lock up all other belongings.

en.question: Is there a safe?
en.answer: Yes. All rooms come with a safe to lock up your valuables.

en.question: Where can I leave my luggage?
en.answer:
You can leave your luggage in your personal locker located on the same floor as your room. 

For larger luggage that do not fit in your locker, we can keep them at reception so please inquire.
